contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 2014 D SCABA Entertainment Contest (B Section)
SCABA Entertainment Contest (B Section) 20 Entertainments Contest with Deportment Mark SCABA Entertainment Contest scaba-entertainment-contest-b-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Points awarded for Music (60), Entertainment Value (30), Presentation & Deportment (10) Additional prizes for best Soloist, best trombone section, best compere/conductor, highest unplaced 3rd section band, highest unplaced youth section band. St Sebastian Wokingham and Denmead withdrawn
Best Soloist – Dan King, Trombone, Chinnor Best Trombone Section – Amersham Best Compere/Conductor – Victoria Curran, Richmond Youth Highest unplaced 3rd section band – Harlow Highest placed scaba member band – Amersham Highest placed Youth band – Richmond Youth
May 14, 2014, 3:31 p.m. May 19, 2014, 8:35 a.m.
1 Amersham Band Paul Fisher
2 LGB Brass Ian Stewart
3 Chinnor Silver Band David Pegram
4 Harlow Brass Chris Johnston
5 Cobham Band Glenn Hayter
6 Richmond Youth Brass Band Victoria Curran
Withdrawn St. Sebastian Wokingham Lee Woodward
Withdrawn Denmead Brass Estelle Flood
Withdrawn Hangleton Band Richard Baker
